#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>

using namespace std;
//USing Shoelace formula
int main(){
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t,n,i;float sum;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--){
	    sum=0;
		cin>>n;
		vector<float> x(n);
	    vector<float> y(n);
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>x[i];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>y[i];
		
		for(i=0;i<n-1;++i){
			sum+=x[i]*y[i+1]-x[i+1]*y[i];
		}
		sum+=x[n-1]*y[0]-x[0]*y[n-1];
		sum=abs(sum)/2;
		printf("%f\n",sum);
		
	}
	return 0;
}
